alert.note: Alert for Macon; Northern Jackson; Southern Jackson; Transylvania (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 10:13PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Franklin, central Stephens, northeastern Habersham, Rabun, Macon, southwestern Transylvania, southern Jackson, southwestern Pickens and Oconee Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1013 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Franklin to 7 miles northwest of Walhalla to 12 miles southwest of Seneca. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clemson, Toccoa, Seneca, Franklin, Walhalla, Clayton, Westminster, Gumlog, Highlands and Mountain City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Macon; Northern Jackson; Southern Jackson; Transylvania
